overview:
Web developer, musician, armchair philosopher.

Media comprehensivist. I can work with a wide variety of media types such as: audio, video, print, and the web.

Web: In new-media & web development I work with businesses, artists, and corporations to create web presence, front-end, and e-commerce solutions. I’ve got a robust background in jQuery, CSS, HTML, and vector/raster graphics apps. On the backend I can work in PHP and Ruby. I set up and administer Linux and BSD web/email servers, deploying LAMP, LAPP, BNMP (BSD, nginx, mysql, PHP), and various Ruby stacks for clients and for miscellaneous personal projects.

Audio & Music: Engineered on Grammy nominated album, produced/engineered indie artists, prolific studio musicians, and Top 40 artists. I’ve been Pro Tools certified, but am fond of the leaner, meaner Reaper DAW environment. Mixing is my specialty. I can polish tracks to commercial or better-than-commercial standards on SSL consoles in huge control rooms or on DAWs with arrays of plugins.
